entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding empty default interface implementations for all interceptor interface methods #27625
    7.0.0
  • SQL Server: introduce UseUtf8() sugar to configure UTF8 properties #27624
    Backlog
  • Provide API for returning Func<TEntity, bool> predicated based on keys #27623
  • After upgrading from EF 6.0.1 to EF 6.0.2: broken query generation when using aggregate #27621

Closed

  • The global interceptor must take effect under the DbContext #27612
  • InMemory generates and assigns Id before SaveChanges #27611
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is connecting #27602
  • Cosmos: Wrong validation on shadow property Partition key #27559
  • Source Generator for EFCore for DB First users. #27553
  • Stop throwing for optional FKs if delete orphans timing is set to Never. #27218
    7.0.0
  • Stop automatically deleting orphans for optional relationships with cascade delete configured #27217
    7.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException on save after upgrading from 5 to 6 #27455
    6.0.4
  • Scaffolding with NRT generates non-nullable navigation property from principal to dependent #27496
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Scaffolding: Use "CodeTemplates" directory #27626

Merged

  • Remove quirks #27622
  • Stop deleting orphans for optional relationships configured for cascade deletes #27557
    breaking-change
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27615
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27593
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27614
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix scaffolding of reference navigations with NRT #27616

Updated

  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
  • Fixes to support multi-dimensional arrays #27618
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
  • Attribute for configuring composite primary keys #27571
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
